theme_opts.title: IntAssi
theme_opts.create_style: nav h2 .text { font-size:17px; } body::-webkit-scrollbar-track, .sidebar-list-div::-webkit-scrollbar-track { -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); background-color: #F5F5F5; } body::-webkit-scrollbar, .sidebar-list-div::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 10px; background-color: #F5F5F5; } body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb, .sidebar-list-div::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: #F90;  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, .2) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, .2) 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, .2) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent) }
